subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The French skipper Michel Desjoyeaux won his second Vendée Globe solo around-the-world yacht race in record-setting time after more than 80 days battling rough seas and high winds. Desjoyeaux steered his yacht Foncia into port in Les Sables d’Olonne on the west coast of France to finish in 84 days 3 hours 9 minutes 8 seconds. Roland Jourdain of France was in second place, more than 1,000 nautical miles behind, on Veolia Environnement.
